diff_act: 1.Ensure all drivers are aware of the connection and communication continuity between multiple traction vehicles.
2.Manage call participants, including adding or removing them as needed.
3.Respond to requests for call reestablishment from other drivers in the event of a connection failure.
4.reestablish the call if it fails for any cab other than the lead traction vehicle
5.attempt to reestablish the radio connection as soon as possible to maintain communication with other drivers.

regen.absent_element: situation of call failure in non-lead traction vehicles
regen.new_specification: If a call failure occurs in a cab other than the lead traction vehicle, the respective driver shall notify the lead driver who will then reestablish the call.

regen.absent_element: Handling procedure when the call fails in any cab other than the lead traction vehicle
regen.new_specification: If the call fails in any cab other than the lead traction vehicle, the driver in the affected cab shall call the lead cab and request reestablishment of the call.

regen.absent_element: reestablishment of call by other drivers when call fails
regen.new_specification: If the call fails for any cab other than the lead traction vehicle, the driver in that cab shall initiate a call to the lead cab and manage the reestablishment of the radio connection.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
